Definition: Hair appears dry and puffy due to lack of moisture or humidity.
Cause: Lack of moisture, humidity, heat damage.
Solution: Use sulfate-free shampoo, deep condition, apply anti-frizz serum.

Definition: White flakes on the scalp caused by excessive shedding of skin cells.
Cause: Dry scalp, fungal infection, product buildup.
Solution: Use anti-dandruff shampoo with zinc pyrithione or tea tree oil.

Definition: Excessive shedding or thinning of hair from the scalp.
Cause: Genetics, stress, poor diet, hormonal imbalance.
Solution: Use hair growth serums, improve diet, reduce stress.

Definition: Scalp produces excess oil, making hair greasy.
Solution: Wash hair with a mild shampoo, avoid heavy conditioners on scalp.

Definition: Hair strands split at the tips, leading to frayed ends.
Cause: Heat styling, chemical treatments, lack of trimming.
Solution: Trim regularly, deep condition, avoid heat tools.

Definition: Hair lacks moisture, making it brittle and rough.
Cause: Overwashing, heat damage, lack of conditioning.
Solution: Use hydrating hair masks, limit heat styling, deep condition.

Definition: Hair becomes weak, dry, and brittle due to excessive heat styling.
Cause: Frequent use of heat tools without protection.
Solution: Apply heat protectant before styling, reduce heat tool usage.

Definition: Hair dye fades over time, losing its vibrancy and depth.
Cause: UV exposure, washing hair with hot water, sulfate shampoos.
Solution: Use color-safe shampoos, avoid excessive sun exposure.

Definition: Scalp becomes red, itchy, or inflamed due to sensitivity or product reactions.
Cause: Harsh hair products, allergies, excess sebum production.
Solution: Use gentle hair products, avoid harsh chemicals, rinse with cool water.

Definition: Hair becomes weak and snaps easily.
Cause: Excessive brushing, chemical treatments, weak hair structure.
Solution: Use strengthening hair masks, avoid excessive heat styling.

Definition: Hair appears thinner over time due to aging or health issues.
Solution: Use volumizing shampoos, improve diet, consult a dermatologist.

Definition: Residue from hair products accumulates, making hair feel heavy or greasy.
Cause: Use of too many styling products, not washing hair properly.
Solution: Clarify hair with a detox shampoo, reduce styling product usage.

Definition: Hair grows slower than expected due to poor scalp health or nutrition.
Cause: Poor diet, clogged hair follicles, genetics.
Solution: Massage scalp with natural oils, eat protein-rich foods.

Definition: Small pimples or bumps appear on the scalp, often due to clogged follicles.
Cause: Excess oil production, poor hygiene, bacterial infection.
Solution: Wash hair regularly, avoid using oily hair products on the scalp.

Definition: Hair knots easily, making it difficult to comb or manage.
Cause: Dry hair, rough towel drying, lack of conditioning.
Solution: Use detangling spray, comb with a wide-tooth comb, moisturize hair.
